Description:
Detects when an adversary is trying to hide it's action from Sysmon logging based on error messages

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Sysmon Configuration Error
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((description like '%failed to open service configuration with error%' or description like '%failed to connect to the driver to update configuration%') and  not ((description like '%failed to open service configuration with error%' and description like '%last error: the media is write protected.%') or (description like '%failed to open service configuration with error 19%' or description like '%failed to open service configuration with error 93%')))
